name: Sporting Goods
description: Explore a wide range of sports equipment and accessories for various activities including hiking, camping, running, swimming, and more.

name: Travel Gear
description: Discover essential travel gear and accessories to make your journeys comfortable and convenient. From backpacks and luggage to travel pillows and accessories.

name: Leisure Products
description: Find leisure products to enhance relaxation and outdoor enjoyment. From hammocks and binoculars to fishing gear and outdoor games.

name: Fitness Equipment
description: Browse through a selection of fitness equipment designed to help you stay in shape and achieve your health goals. Includes workout machines, weights, and accessories.

name: Outdoor Apparel
description: Stay comfortable and protected during your outdoor adventures with our range of outdoor apparel. From waterproof jackets and hiking boots to moisture-wicking shirts and thermal layers.
